Directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute the onions, celery and mushrooms in butter until tender. Reduce heat. Add the turkey, broth, soup and sour cream; heat through (do not boil). Season with pepper. Drain pasta; top with turkey mixture.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced-fat, reduced-sodium cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
